To some emirs, power is a warm fire. To others, it is a chill darkness. #Power=#Fire #Power=#Darkness
Strong is the force in unattractive tramps if pity they reject Establish hives, they will Stunning queens will they be #ThingsYodaNeverSaid
The shy hermits that tire of obscurity will be reborn as outspoken liberals who promote tolerance. That's #Karma! #ThingsBuddhaNeverSaid
"Verily, it is better to be a cheerleader performing a monotonous chant than a hero performing an exciting quest." #ThingsJesusNeverSaid
Many phonies were phony horses in their past lives. And some will be reborn as komodo dragons in the next. #Karma #Phony=#Komodo_dragon
The phonies that tell wicked lies in this life will be reborn as wicked komodo dragons in the next. #Karma #ThingsBuddhaNeverSaid
